Broccoli Fritters


Ingredients
10 ounces chopped broccoli
â…” cup flour
2 large eggs
2 ounces shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
1 teaspoon Mexican seasoning mix
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
2 tablespoons vegetable oil
2 tablespoons sour cream, or to taste
casero pollo asado seasoning (such as

Cooking Instructions

Place chopped broccoli in a microwave-safe bowl. Pour 3
tablespoons water over the top and cover with a plate.
Microwave on high for 2 minutes. Add softened broccoli,
flour, and egg to a food processor. Pulse until well
combined. Transfer mixture to a bowl. Mix in cheese, Mexican
seasoning, salt, and pepper until well incorporated. Heat
oil in a non-stick skillet over medium-high. Use a scoop to
portion out about 2 tablespoons of mixture. Drop broccoli
mixture into hot oil and flatten out with a spatula. Cook
broccoli fritters until golden brown, about 3 minutes per
side. Transfer cooked fritters onto a cooling rack set over
a baking tray. Serve with sour cream and seasoning.
